name: Overjuice
description:
"Overjuice"  is a thrilling game where you play as a lone survivor in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Your goal is to gather as much juice as you can to survive, while avoiding the dangers of mad zombies and lethal radiation that roam the ruins of civilization. Explore the desolate landscape, gather resources and make smart decisions to outwit the undead and stay alive in this heart-pumping survival game. Get ready for an intense and unforgettable journey filled with challenges and adventure. Download now and see if you have what it takes to survive in a world of zombies and thirst.

CONTROL:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

LMB - Shoot

F - Heal
